text: Sebastião Ribeiro Salgado Júnior (February 8, 1944 – May 23, 2025) was a Brazilian social documentary photographer and photojournalist. Salgado was a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador. He was awarded the W. Eugene Smith Memorial Fund Grant in 1982. He became a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences in 1992. He was a member of the Académie des Beaux-Arts at the Institut de France.
